CustomField.description: Used as merge fields in email template
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Account.IsPersonAccount, text(Account.Salutation)<>"" ), CASE(text(Account.Salutation), "男性", "拝啓 " + Account.LastName, "女性", "親愛なる夫人 " + Account.LastName, ""), "こんにちは " + Account.FirstName + " " + Account.LastName )
CustomField.label: Salutation Email Ja
